title: Lime Pretzel Jello
instructions: Combine pretzels, butter, and brown sugar. Press into a 9x9 baking dish. Bake at 350Â° for 10 mins.

Mix together cream cheese, whipped topping, and powdered sugar. Spread on top of pretzel crust once it has cooled. Whisk Jello with 1 cup hot water and pour on top of cream cheese mixture. Let set for 4 hours or overnight.
